name: Double-barrelled Aggression
description: Up to 3 crew gain +1 hit with handguns

name: Boarding Party
description: Ignore being distracted

name: Battlehammer
description: When making a smash attack, gain +1 dice for each Hazard Token.

name: Terrifying Lunatic
description: When an opposing vehicle ends within short range, it gains a Hazard Token.

name: Grinderman
description: Can add Hazard Tokens to smash targets instead of hull points.

name: Murder Tractor
description: Can make piledriver attacks, like a War Rig.

name: Powder Keg
description: Add +1 to explosion checks. Treat as one weights-class heavier when it explodes.

name: Road Warrior
description: Remove a Hazard Token when causing 1+ hits

name: Cover Me
description: Once per activation, may remove a Hazard Token and place it on a friendly vehicle within double range.

name: Fist of Steel
description: Take a Hazard Token to reroll all dice during a smash.

name: Madman
description: At the end of activation, if has 4+ Hazard Tokens, may move a Hazard Token to a vehicle within medium range.

name: Crowd Pleaser
description: If this vehicle wipes out, gain +1 Audience Vote.

name: Evasive
description: Counts a 5+ as a success when evading.

name: Powerslide
description: May use any template except a long straight when sliding.

name: Slippery
description: Smash attacks against this vehicle suffer -2 attack dice.

name: Trick Driving
description: May count current gear as one higher or lower when selecting a template. Unpermitted manoeuvres counts as hazardous.

name: Stunt Driver
description: Gain 3 hazard tokens to ignore any obstructions.

name: Chrome-Whisperer
description: My push it any number ot times.

name: Return Fire
description: Once per gear step, when attacked, gain +1 Hazard Token to to also attack.

name: Dead-Eye
description: Up to 3 crew gain +1 hit against targets within double range but not medium range.

name: Rapid Fire
description: Once per attack step, one crew may fire twice.

name: Headshot
description: With shooting attacks, critical hit do 3 hits (not 2).

name: Loader
description: May assign 2 crew to a weapon to gain +1 hit.

name: Fully Loaded
description: When attacking with a shooting weapon with 2+ ammo, gain +1 hit.

name: Big Tyres
description: Ignore rough and treacherous surfaces.

name: Moment of Glory
description: Once per game, after rolling skid dice, change the results.

name: Easy Rider
description: Once per turn, may discard one rolled skid dice.

name: Restraint
description: No Hazard Token for shifting down a gear.

name: Expertise
description: +1 handling.

name: Handbrake Artist
description: When applying a spin result, may face any direction.

name: Hot Start
description: Roll a D6 at the start of the game. Start in that gear.

name: Slipstream
description: During a skid check, gain 1 shift result if there is a vehicle within short range in front.

name: Force Transferal
description: On losing 1+ hull from a blast attack, may stick shift up.

name: Time Extended
description: After passing a gate, may remove any number of Hazard Tokens.

name: Hell for Leather
description: Can choose a long straight in any gear. It is never hazardous or trivial.

name: Rocket Thrusters
description: When flipped, may choose the long straight, veer, or gentle templates.

name: Whizbang
description: At the start of each game, gain a random speed perk.

name: Gyroscope
description: At the start of each game, gain a random precision perk.

name: Mobile Mechanic
description: Once per turn, instead of attacking, a crewmember may repair 1 hull.

name: Experimental Nuclear Engine
description: +2 max gear (up to 6). If fails a flip check, explodes. When explodes, counts as heavyweights.
